name: Windstep
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
As a response to any action, you move 30 feet. This can cause attacks aimed at you to miss. Spells that target you will still be targeting you, but spells that target an area can be avoided if you are out of range.

If you used this in response to an action that would not affect you, you regain half the MP spent on this spell.
